title: White-Box Uncertainty Aware RAG System
description: Designed and implemented a RAG system using Qwen2.5-0.5B for driving queries with white-box uncertainty quantification (retriever scores + generator entropy). Built confidence-based error gating and evaluated using ECE, AUROC. Sole contributor.

title: AI Coding Assistant Prototype
description: Built internal assistant for code review & documentation using LangChain and OpenAI GPT-4 API. Benchmarked against human-written code.

title: Agentic Workflow Optimization System
description: Developed AI agent for automating documentation and report generation. Compared OpenAI, Anthropic, and AWS Bedrock â€” achieved ~50% faster task completion.

title: Generative AI Knowledge Retrieval Tool
description: Implemented RAG pipeline with FAISS and embedding search. Fine-tuned lightweight LLMs for QA over structured datasets.

title: 3D Vision-Based Automation Project
description: Real-time object tracking for humanoid robotics using OpenCV + PyTorch. Integrated perception with actuation via sensor fusion.

title: Process Data Visualization Tool
description: Streamlit dashboard for real-time workflow efficiency metrics in industrial automation.
